known_issues: La palette colori attuale non corrisponde a quella originale (richiesto bianco e marroncino/beige).

existing_features.title: Restore the UI color palette to the original light theme using a white background and beige/brown (light brown) accents across the app.
Remove or neutralize any remaining dark-theme styling so that the app cannot visually switch to a dark/black palette (including when the OS is in dark mode).

new_feature_requests.summary: Ripristinare la palette colori originale (bianco e marroncino/beige)

projectName: Restore original white and beige/brown color palette
